title: Buy groceries
description: Purchase milk, bread, eggs, and fruits from the supermarket.

title: Finish project report
description: Complete the final report for the frontend development project by reviewing the last section.

title: Exercise
description: Go for a 30-minute run and do a set of home exercises.

title: Call mom
description: Check in with mom to see how she's doing and update her about the recent job application.

title: Plan weekend getaway
description: Research destinations and accommodations for a weekend trip, and make a booking.
